Course_Name: [SoSe 24] Lecture: Machine Learning for Computer Security

Messages.Author: Jonas Möller
Messages.Content: Dear students,  if you are an exchange student, you might need to register for this course via a separate form (and not via MOSES). If this applies to you, please send me the filled out form to my mail address "jonas.moeller.1@tu-berlin.de". If you are unsure, whether this applies to you, please get in contact with your examination office.  Best regards, Jonas
